cast.overview: The Templeton brothers — Tim and his Boss Baby little bro Ted — have become adults and drifted away from each other. But a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach and a can-do attitude is about to bring them together again … and inspire a new family business.
cast.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business

details.biography: Miles Christopher Bakshi is an American actor, known for The Boss Baby (2017), Shrek Forever After (2010) and Shrek the Halls (2007). Son of writer Preston Bakshi and producer Gina Shay. Grandson of Elizabeth (Bassett) and retired animator Ralph Bakshi. Older brother of Nina Zoe Bakshi.
details.name: Miles Bakshi
